about_the_game:
Wasteland Travelers is a gritty zombie survival game with gorgeous pixel graphics. You have to do everything you can to survive and thrive in a world flooded by zombies and bandits.

The apocalypse happened in the summer of 2035. The society led by the Giant Corps collapsed within a month. In the world of Wasteland Travelers, merely surviving is challenging. You must be prepared to face the lack of supplies, severe weathers, radiations and infections. You also need to fend off crazed zombies, hostile robots, and enemy factions' pursuit.

Compared to other survival games, Wasteland Traveler has a vast system of factions, quests, and NPCs. You could scavenge weapons, medical supplies, vehicles, and tools made by the Corporations pre-apocalypse to reach your goals and solve your problems.

There are four rules you have to remember.

Firstly, slow down and be alert. While you explore the devastated Area 5, you need to watch out for zombies and marauders lurking in the shadows. Even though there are great risks in the wasteland, the reward for besting it is immense.

Secondly, tell friends from foes. Those who are trustworthy are the anchor points that will sustain your survival. Not everyone is your enemy, but keep an eye out for those that are.  Work will your faction members to help each other survive in the harsh world, restore order, and rebuild a society.

Thirdly, keep exploring and don't stop. Through the clash of the factions and the dark schemes of the Giant Corporations, find the truth behind the apocalypse in the North.

Lastly, take your PAX!

The wasteland welcomes you, survivor!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5200U/AMD FX-9800P
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8550U/Ryzen 5 2500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Society governed by the Giant Corporations fell. It's all you now. Travel to the Marion Military Outpost and scavenge, fight and fend off the ferocious zombies and bandits, and eventually obtain the key to restoring civilization in Area 5.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
